I actually agree that a persistent 1-1 mappings can not always be implement=
ed (and maybe even rarely so), but I do think it is worthwhile to have wher=
e it is possible. So one should not give up in advance but rather look for =
where in a design it would be possible. F.x. here:

/documents/docid12345

=
This resource and URL could be persistent (as long as the document is not d=
eleted) and have a 1-1 mapping but the access rights for users to the resou=
rce at this URL could change over time. 

/Morten
